about_the_game:
About


The Island of Spirits is a randomly generated, 2D rogue-like action platformer. You play as the Green Knight on his adventure to claim the king’s bounty. You’ll face mushrooms, crystals, and other bizarre beasts, along with menacing bosses. Discover the secrets of the island’s three distinct areas.



    Key Features

  • More than 150 items
  • 3 randomly generated areas
  • 3 bosses
  • Full controller support
  • Awesome music
  • Tons of different and unique NPCs

short_description: The Island of Spirits is a randomly generated action 2D Platformer Rogue-Like. Following the Green Knight on his adventure to get the bounty of the king. On his way he will fight Mushrooms, Crystals, bizarre creatures and defeat big bosses, discover more about the Green Knight and about The Island.
